accepted_if: Ɛsɛ sɛ wogye :attribute no tom bere a :other yɛ :value no.
after: Ɛsɛ sɛ :attribute no yɛ date a edi :date akyi.
after_or_equal: Ɛsɛ sɛ :attribute no yɛ da a edi :date akyi anaasɛ ɛne no yɛ pɛ.
alpha: Ɛsɛ sɛ nkyerɛwde nkutoo na ɛwɔ :attribute no mu.
alpha_dash: Ɛsɛ sɛ nkyerɛwde, nɔma, nsensanee ne nkyerɛwde a wɔde hyɛ ase nkutoo na ɛwɔ :attribute no mu.
alpha_num: Ɛsɛ sɛ nkyerɛwde ne nɔma nkutoo na ɛwɔ :attribute no mu.

before: Ɛsɛ sɛ :attribute no yɛ date a edi :date anim.
before_or_equal: Ɛsɛ sɛ :attribute no yɛ da a edi :date anim anaasɛ ɛne no yɛ pɛ.

between.string: Ɛsɛ sɛ nkyerɛwde :attribute no yɛ nkyerɛwde :min kosi :max.

can: :attribute field no kura botae bi a wɔmma ho kwan.
confirmed: :attribute a wɔde si so dua no nhyia.
contains: :attribute field no nni botae a wɔhwehwɛ.

declined_if: Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔpow :attribute no bere a :other yɛ :value no.
digits_between: Ɛsɛ sɛ :attribute no yɛ nkyerɛwde :min kosi :max ntam.
dimensions: :attribute no wɔ mfonini no nsusuwii a ɛnteɛ.
distinct: :attribute afuw no wɔ botae a ɛyɛ abien.
doesnt_end_with: Ɛnsɛ sɛ :attribute afuw no ba awiei wɔ nea edidi so yi mu biako mu: :values.

failed: Saa adansedi nkrataa yi ne yɛn kyerɛwtohɔ ahorow no nhyia.
filled: Ɛsɛ sɛ :attribute afuw no nya bo a ɛsom.

min_digits: Anyɛ yiye koraa no, ɛsɛ sɛ afuw :attribute no nya nkyerɛwde :min.

missing_with_all: Ɛsɛ sɛ :attribute afuw no yera bere a :values wɔ hɔ no.
password.letters: Anyɛ yiye koraa no, ɛsɛ sɛ nkyerɛwde biako na ɛwɔ afuw :attribute no mu.
password.mixed: Anyɛ yiye koraa no, ɛsɛ sɛ nkyerɛwde akɛse biako ne nkyerɛwde nketewa biako na ɛwɔ afuw :attribute no mu.

password.uncompromised: :attribute a wɔde ama no apue wɔ data leak mu. Yɛsrɛ sɛ paw :attribute foforo.

present_with_all: Ɛsɛ sɛ afuw :attribute no wɔ hɔ bere a :values wɔ hɔ no.

prohibited_unless: Wɔabara :attribute afuw no gye sɛ :other wɔ :values mu.

required_with_all: Wɔhwehwɛ sɛ :attribute afuw no bere a :values wɔ hɔ no.

required_without_all: Wɔhwehwɛ sɛ wɔde :attribute afuw no di dwuma bere a :values no mu biara nni hɔ no.
reset: Wɔasan de wo password no asi hɔ.
